data.title: United Arab Emirates
data.text:
Facts and figures

Official country name:United Arab EmiratesNational capital:Abu DhabiLocation:In the east of the Arabian peninsula, bordering Saudi Arabia to the west and south, and Oman to the east.Area:84,000 km2Population:9.71 millionPopulation density:116 per km2GDP per capita:US$ 91,907*GDP at market prices:US$ 504,173 million*

* Source: OPEC Annual Statistical Bulletin 2024

OPEC Fund Ministerial Council Member:

HH Sheikh Maktoum Bin Mohammed Al Maktoum, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance, Ministry of Finance

HE Mohammed Bin Hadi Al Hussaini, Minister of State for Financial Affairs, Ministry of Finance

OPEC Fund Governing Board Representative:

Ms. Thuraiya Hamid Alhashmi, Director of International Financial Relations and Organizations, Ministry of Finance

OPEC Fund Alternate Governing Board Representative:

Mr. Hammad Essa Al-Zaabi, Director of the Minister's Office, Ministry of Finance
